## Overview

The R/Pharma 2025 conference featured over 30 presentations organized into 8 Europe/US thematic sessions and an Asia/Pacific session. These talks covered the latest innovations, case studies, and strategic insights in using R for pharmaceutical research and development.

## ğŸ’¡ Key Takeaways

### Industry Transformation

-   GSK leading with **50%+ R code** target achieved
-   Major pharma embracing open-source workflows
-   SAS to R migration gaining momentum

### AI Revolution

-   Practical, production-ready implementations
-   Privacy-preserving approaches for clinical data
-   Agentic systems and tool orchestration

### Standards Adoption

-   CDISC ARS/ARM driving automation
-   Harmonized outputs across organizations
-   Machine-readable analysis results

### Validation Maturity

-   Risk-based approaches becoming standard
-   Shared metric repositories emerging
-   GxP-ready Shiny applications feasible
